page.title: 18LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: Each year there is a village fete held on the village green and sometimes a carnival procession through the streets in which the school takes part. There is an annual "Superstars" competition in which families from the village compete against each other in feats of sporting skill. The village school and football club hold annual "Boot Fairs" to raise funds and these have become popular social events. The school holds an annual Sport's Day and every few years hosts a combined carol service in the parish church for all the village schools in the area. This year an egg rolling competition was held on the downs at Easter. An entertainment evening is held at the school, devised by the children.
